skillDetails.name: Mighty Boost
skillDetails.description: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster gains Might, they gain a shield equal to 100% of their Attack and 1 harmful Stack is removed.

monstersWithSkill.skillDescription: Unique Aura: When an allied Monster gains Might, they gain a shield equal to 100% of their Attack and 1 harmful Stack is removed.
